definitions.example: Above, the stars appeared to move slowly athwart.
a fleet standing athwart our course

definitions.definition: From one side to the other side of.
definitions.example: The stars moved slowly athwart the sky.

definitions.definition: Across the line of a ship's course or across its deck.
definitions.example: The damaged mainmast fell athwart the deck, destroying the ship's boat.

definitions.definition: Across the path or course of; opposing.
